channel.title: CVE Feed for AgilePoint -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AgilePoint -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-31178|2024-08-02T14:45:25.708Z -- agilepoint -- nx
item.description: AgilePoint NX v8.0 SU2.2 & SU2.3 – Arbitrary File Delete Vulnerability allows arbitrary file deletion, by an unspecified request.

item.title: CVE-2023-24507|2024-08-02T10:56:04.239Z -- agilepoint -- nx
item.description: AgilePoint NX v8.0 SU2.2 & SU2.3 – Insecure File Upload - Vulnerability allows insecure file upload, by an unspecified request.

item.title: CVE-2023-31179|2024-08-02T14:45:26.068Z -- agilepoint -- nx
item.description: AgilePoint NX v8.0 SU2.2 & SU2.3 - Path traversal - Vulnerability allows path traversal and downloading files from the server, by an unspecified request.
